msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the right and the left. Kollesis at the right. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Onnophris, son of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Petekouis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 186)
Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Ptolemaios, son of Psenesis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Apollonia, daughter of Harphaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 152)
Potoslykos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 215)
Mysthes, son of Naaraus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 149)
Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)
Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 176)
Isidoros, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 179)
Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Phaesis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikos, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Germanus, slave of Longinus Isidoros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 160)
Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Lucius Julius Germanus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Psensin (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Mysthes, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petsiris, mother Sambous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 188)
Ptolemaios, son of Phaomgeus, grandson of Phaomgeus, mother Taptosiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Tasoucharion, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 239)
Ptollas, son of Abel (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221)
Petaus, son of Petalos, grandson of Petaus, mother Taeuhemeros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 209)
Tanomgeus, daughter of Pakysis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 234)
(Maximus the bitter?)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224;

div.ab: "(Column) 65:;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris (Petekouis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 0.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 36 obols 12)eparourion drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 16 obols 5.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 18 obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Psenesis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4 obols 20;;Apollonia, daughter of Harphaesis (he of Potoslykos);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 9) eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Mysthes, son of Naaraus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, copper tetradrachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 188 obols 12;;(Pachon) 19 likewise:;Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios, copper tetradrachmas 12;;Isidoros, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, obols 28;;Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion, obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 40 obols 27;;(Pachon) 20 likewise:;Phaesis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikos, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Germanus, slave of Longinus Isidoros, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis, drachmas 4;;Lucius Julius Germanus (Psensin);;(in left margin: obols 8) naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4.5 chalki 2;;Mysthes, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petsiris, mother Sambous;;guard tax drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Phaomgeus, grandson of Phaomgeus, mother Taptosiris, drachmas 4;;Tasoucharion, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion (Ptollas, son of Abel);;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 22 obols 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5, in total drachmas 23 obols 4.5;;In total for the day drachmas 48 obols 8.;(Pachon) 21 likewise:;Petaus, son of Petalos, grandson of Petaus, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 4;;Tanomgeus, daughter of Pakysis (Maximus, the bitter?);(drachmas 12) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL VII, 109 (on l. 2652) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
